mapper.select: select BOARDNO, EMAIL, NICKNAME, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENT, BOARDGRADE, BOARDVIEWCOUNT, BOARDLIKECOUNT, BOARDDATE, BOARDYN, MAINIMAGE, TAGS, COURSENO from COURSEREVIEW WHERE boardyn = 'Y' order by boardno desc
select COMMENTID, BOARDNO, COMMENTERNAME, COMMENTCONTENT, COMMENTDATE, EMAIL, STARRATING from comments where boardNo = #{boardNo} order by commentId desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments ( commentId, boardNo, commenterName, commentContent, commentDate, email, starRating ) VALUES ( comment_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardNo}, #{commenterName}, #{commentContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{email}, #{starRating} )
mapper.select: SELECT boardTitle, boardViewCount, nickname, mainImage, boardGrade FROM COURSEREVIEW WHERE boardYN = 'Y' AND boardTitle LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' ORDER BY boardno DESC
